name: Dungeon Crawl
description:
Dungeon Crawl

Left to rot in a dank dungeon at the uncanny whim of a dark wizard, sneak past legions of skeleton thralls and escape the maddening game of this decrepit captor. Find freedom or die like those whose bones forged the wizard's minions.

Features
  • 3D graphics
  • 3 Dungeon Levels
  • Taunting Wizard at each checkpoint
  • Skeleton Warriors
